amendment.description: To modify the conditions under which aliens who are unlawfully present in the United States are granted legal status.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4087 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 61. Record Vote Number: 138.

action.text: Amendment SA 4087 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S4851-4860, S4873-4874, S4875) To modify the conditions under which aliens who are unlawfully present in the United States are granted legal status.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4087 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4087 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 61. Record Vote Number: 138.
